message: Let's be fair and start with a reasonable split. I'll take a bit more since I'm making the first offer.
Your turn Alice.  Let's speed this up. I'll take the same amount you offered me, but on my terms.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I should get a bit more. Let's meet in the middle.
This is getting ridiculous. It's a 50/50 split or we both lose out!
